summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet pipeline with Plug‑and‑Play (PAG) functionality, setting up dummy components and inputs to verify configuration handling, enable/disable behavior, unconditional generation, and optional component persistence.
business_intent: Validate and maintain the correctness of the advanced diffusion pipeline during development, reducing regression risk and ensuring that PAG features work as expected before release.
